review: Does NOT work with HULU.  Netflix, Amazon Prime, all other apps are fine.  Hulu will lag and ultimately freeze after a few minutes.  Not a bandwidth issue, not a wireless channel issue.  Google is filled with posts about people with this same problem, no response from Amazon.  I got my Fire Stick as a gift.  I will be returning it for a Roku.
author: Max

review: I am addicted to this and it's so simple to use! I love that this allows me to stream my youtube to my big tv. so convenient.
author: Ashley

review: love it! this amazon fire tv is awesome!

review: It does everything that it is advertised to do ...

review: I love it. Easy and fast to setup . I also have Amazon Fire but had to order the stick for an app that I can only get on the stick. Worth it.
